observation: I can see a language selection modal is open with multiple language options displayed. There are also two visible country selection UI elements in the background - the main country dropdown (element 43-45) and some country options (like Indonesia at element 183). I need to first close this language modal to proceed with the sign-up process. I can see a close button at element 23.
reasoning: As an elderly user, I need to close this language selection popup first before I can continue with the country selection. The close button is clearly visible and I should tap it to dismiss this modal so I can get back to selecting my residence country.
ux_issues: Language modal popup appeared without clear indication of why it opened
Close button could be larger for elderly users

outcome.visual_observation: The language selection modal/overlay has been closed. The numbered overlay indicators (1-44) that were visible in the BEFORE screenshot are no longer present in the AFTER screenshot, indicating the modal has been dismissed. The main residence selection form remains visible and accessible.
